mapper.insert: INSERT INTO register_demand_interval (store_code, target_date, from_time, to_time, demand, task_code) VALUES (#{storeCode}, #{targetDate}, #{from}, #{to}, #{demand}, #{taskCode}) ON CONFLICT (store_code, target_date, from_time, to_time, COALESCE(task_code, '')) DO UPDATE SET demand = EXCLUDED.demand
